description: Test suite for the Agent class, verifying tool call limits and streaming behavior in the agno project.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Agent class responsible for managing interactions with language models and tools.

methods.name: test_tool_use_tool_call_limit
methods.description: Tests that the agent respects the tool call limit during a synchronous run.

methods.name: test_tool_use_tool_call_limit_stream
methods.description: Tests that the agent respects the tool call limit during a streaming response.

methods.name: test_tool_use_tool_call_limit_async
methods.description: Asynchronous test verifying tool call limit enforcement during async run.

methods.name: test_tool_use_tool_call_limit_stream_async
methods.description: Asynchronous streaming test for tool call limit enforcement.
